channel.title: Chat Filter
channel.description:
Has Anyone Got A Code For a Chat Filter Im Sick Of Looking Over The Same Pages Again And Agian Trying To Look For One! Or Maybe A Filter That BLocks Words So I Can Add ! For Each Word? Client Side Or server Im Not Bothered.
If You Dont Have An Answer Dont Post If You Want To Flame DOnt Bother!
